recipe.title: Banana and Pineapple Cake

preparation.li: Preheat oven to 180 C / Gas 4. Grease and flour a 26cm tube cake tin.

In a large bowl, mix together the flour, sugar, bicarbonate of soda, cinnamon and salt. Make a well in the centre and pour in the eggs, oil, bananas and pineapple. Mix well and pour into prepared tin.

Bake in the preheated oven for 70 to 80 minutes or until a skewer inserted into the centre of the cake comes out clean. Let cool in tin for 10 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack and cool completely.

recipe.comment: use some powdered sugar to coat the top
